1.name: Will or Power
1.quality: Will to manifest, Divine Purpose, Leadership

2.name: Love-Wisdom
2.virtue: Calm, strength, patience, endurance, love of truth, faithfulness, intuition, clear intelligence, serene temper
2.vice: Over-absorption in study, coldness, indifference, contempt of mental limitations in others

3.name: Active Intelligence
3.virtue: Wide views on all abstract questions, sincerity of purpose, clear intellect, capacity for concentration, patience, caution, absence of the tendency to worry over trifles
3.vice: Intellectual pride, coldness, isolation, inaccuracy in details, absent-mindedness, obstinacy, selfishness, overmuch criticism of others

4.name: Harmony through Conflict
4.virtue: Strong affections, sympathy, physical courage, generosity, devotion, intellect, perception
4.vice: Self-centeredness, worrying, inaccuracy, lack of confidence, lack of moral courage
4.special_significance: Bridge between higher and lower, humanity's ray, creative resolution

5.name: Concrete Knowledge
5.virtue: Strictly accurate statements, justice, perseverance, common sense, uprightness, independence, keen intellect
5.vice: Harsh criticism, narrowness, arrogance, unforgiving temper, lack of sympathy and reverence, prejudice

6.name: Devotion and Idealism
6.virtue: Devotion, single-mindedness, love, tenderness, intuition, loyalty, reverence
6.vice: Selfish and jealous love, over-leaning on others, partiality, self-deception, sectarianism, superstition, prejudice, over-rapid conclusions, fiery anger

7.name: Ceremonial Order
7.virtue: Strength, perseverance, courage, courtesy, extreme care in details, self-reliance
7.vice: Formalism, bigotry, pride, narrowness, superficial judgments, self-opinion overmuch

1.name: Logoic Plane
1.description: Plane of divine purpose and will, source of all manifestation

2.name: Monadic Plane
2.description: Plane of the Monad, divine spark, love-wisdom aspect

3.name: Atmic Plane
3.description: Plane of spiritual will, home of the spiritual triad

4.name: Buddhic Plane
4.description: Plane of pure reason and intuition, Christ consciousness, unity awareness
4.special_significance: Bridge between spiritual and personality planes, intuitive perception

5.name: Mental Plane
5.description: Plane of mind, abstract and concrete thought, ideas and concepts

6.name: Astral Plane
6.description: Plane of emotions, desires, feelings, astral experiences

7.name: Physical Plane
7.description: Plane of dense matter and etheric energies, physical manifestation

ray_4.significance: Bridge between higher spiritual triad (rays 1,2,3) and lower quaternary (rays 5,6,7)

plane_4.significance: Bridge between spiritual planes (1,2,3) and personality planes (5,6,7)

humanity.fourth_kingdom: Humanity is the 4th kingdom, bridge between animal and spiritual
humanity.role: Mediator between higher and lower kingdoms

plane_frequencies.frequency_progression: descending from white light to dense matter

metadata.source: Alice Bailey - Treatise on the Seven Rays
metadata.note: These are core esoteric definitions for visualization purposes
